title: 1 police officer dies, over 200 admitted to NHC due to clashes
body_lines: A 24-year old police constable has died and more than 210 persons have been admitted to the Colombo National Hospital due to clashes that took place yesterday.
Hospital sources said the police constable was admitted to the hospital with wounds suspected to have been sustained due to an explosion of a tear gas grenade.
Meanwhile, another man who was at the GotaGoGama protest site in Galle Face Green had also died on admission to the National Hospital due to a heart condition.(DSB)
